c74object.name: PAM.shumaturtle~
c74object.digest: A modal model of a clarinet
c74object.description: A modal model of a clarinet

objarg.name: quality_factor
objarg.digest: Initial dissipation in the reflexion function
objarg.description: Initial dissipation in the reflexion function.

attribute.name: pressure_ratio
attribute.digest: Pressure inside the mouth compared to the pressure needed to close the reed
attribute.description: Pressure inside the mouth compared to the pressure needed to close the reed

attribute.name: reed_opening
attribute.digest: Describes how the clarinet gives the air way
attribute.description: Describes how the clarinet gives the air way

attribute.name: resonator_time
attribute.digest: Time for the sound to go back and forth in the resonator
attribute.description: Time for the sound to go back and forth in the resonator
